name: Ancient Gods
description:
Mild strategic turn-based card battle


You no longer have too much headache in having to control many characters as well as confront many opponents, just focus on the cards in your hand and make perfect decisions in the events you meet on the road.

30+ characters to play with their own unique passives skill


Summon and complete your collection of gods

Classes and Skill System


The class system determines the deck you carry, and the skills you learn along the way will give you the freedom to create a multitude of combinations.
